title: Woman indicted for child neglect after toddler accidentally shot himself
content:
A grand jury has indicted 19-year-old Hope Magiera on a neglect charge, after police say her 2-year-old son shot himself in January.
The Saint Joe County 'Special Victims Unit' started investigating after the toddler suffered a gunshot wound at a home in the 27-hundred block of Edison Road in South Bend.
The boy went to the hospital in serious condition.
Magiera is in the Saint Joe County Jail and will go before a judge at the end of November.
